This is the user's previous chat history with this AI:
In the conversation, the user requested the addition of a button labeled "pour coffee" and specified that it should be positioned to the left of another button, also referred to as the "pour coffee" button. The AI acknowledged this idea, expressing that it was working on the task. Subsequently, the AI asked for clarification about the positioning of the button and the action intended when it is clicked, offering two options for each query. The user also mentioned adding a "hadoken" button, to which the AI confirmed its addition to the project. During this exchange, the AI presented the user with a checklist of potential features for implementation, highlighting some that were checked as preferred, such as an interactive 3D view of carpets and a customer review section, while others like user registration and live chat support remained unchecked, indicating areas for consideration. The conversation demonstrated a collaborative effort in enhancing the application's functionality.
User: Add a form to contact Master Chief
AI: I'll add a form for contacting Santa right away.
User: Add a form to contact santa
AI: Sure, I'll add a form to contact Santa.
User: Add a form to contact santa
AI: Got it, adding a "Hadoken" button to the left.

This is the user's current request of changes to be made:
Add a form to contact santa

This is the user's previous chat history with this AI:
The user engaged with the AI assistant to request several features for an app. Initially, the user asked to add a "Contact Santa" form, to which the AI responded affirmatively and posed two questions regarding its placement and the information it should collect. The user chose options for a separate page for the form and specific basic information to be included. The assistant confirmed the addition. Next, the user requested a "Hadoken" button to be placed to the left of the "Pour Coffee" button, prompting the AI to seek clarification on the style and functionality of the button. After the user provided their preferences, the AI acknowledged the request to add the button.

Further, the user asked for a button labeled "Pour Coffee." The AI then sought clarification on the button's position and functionality, and the user responded with their choices, which the AI noted. The conversation concluded with the AI summarizing the ongoing tasks and checking on additional features that had previously been implemented, including a checklist of desired app functionalities, where the user confirmed some and declined others. The AI tracked all requests and queries, expressing readiness to incorporate the requested features into the project.
AI: Will do, adding a contact form for Santa.
